content: So far I have a lot of fun in this game. Music and graphics very good. The only problem I have with controls, sometimes they may be funky. Also combat need a bit more improvement or maybe new class or new weapon type.

First and foremost i love the game, its fantastic, the controls are solid, the music fits for the type of game, the gameplay has got the addicting 'i died but i need to keep going' and its fantastic. Only a few gripes, some of the animations are a little stiff, and its a grind for better equipment.
Great game

content: Best game ever. Every money spend totally worth it.

content: Great game, has equipment you can find or buy with some souls like elements. Their other game Dark Rage is very similar to this one but I'm not sure if it's part 2 or a totally different game. Either way, if you buy this or Dark Rage you'll get your money's worth.
Its simple but has its own vibe with really cool music it feels like 2D dotted witcher3
This was a wonderful game! I loved it! I just beat it today. I'd highly recommend. I hope you guys come out with another game similar to this one! I'll support you guys all the way!

content: Very difficult.....l like it!!!
Perfect

Great platformer RPG. No ads. The only in-game purchases are a secret to be found. Warning: they are mostly low-costing but can be game-breaking. I would rather have cosmetics or support the devs option Controls are easy to learn. Combat is a bit too simplistic but does have many options to equip items to deal with new areas. There is no explanation of how to use rage. The backtracking can be annoying at times perhaps implementing an easier way to return to certain locations, travel points?
Very nice and RPG like. Really enjoying it. Great graphics and gameplay.
Absolutely love this game, thank you for your hard work, it's appreciated!!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Very nice. I hope you also enjoy my new game when it comes out. Good game.

content: This game is crazy good. The control feels mostly smooth although sometimes clunky, but that doesn't really take away the experience. It's clearly a game with a nice learning curve considering the combat is simple to learn but also hard to master. The only downside is the backtracking in some of the parts that I already passed, like I need to find the same lever to pull down the same wall; but it's very minor comparing it to what the game has to offer. Overall, 4.9/5 from me.
Game is fun! Has a 2D Dark Souls feel to it! For 2.99 it's worth it!
Castlevania meets Dark Souls meets Aladin on the Sega Genesis... good stuff!!
Oh is it that skeleton guy?
replyContent: To pass the forgotten kingdom, after defeating the last boss, a new npc will appear in the citadel. on the second floor, to the right of the blacksmith. Further, if you want to find a secret boss, you will need a Demonic Key.

content: Great pocket game. It's like playing dark souls on SNES. Great job devs!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, I'm currently working on a sequel to the game. It will be a big and intense game.

content: great game
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

content: So far im really liking this game. Overall im finding it to be both challenging and fair enough that im not disheartened. All of the bosses have a chackpoint in front of them so you can try different strategies each time you die and you will die unless you are much better than me (which may be the case). Lots of secret areas give access to higher tier gear. Interactions are solid. The devs have put a lot of work into this gem. Cant wait to see what more they do with it.
Laggy controls steep learning curve lucky it's a cheap game

content: pretty dang good

content: Nice old school action rpg.

content: Great game definitely not easy, if your a dark souls fan you'll like this game.

I have played through half the game by now, and it has been a long and tiredsome Adventure. The gameplay, storyline, and challenges are repetitive doll. Through out the game i can collect stuff to craft wepons but the wepons i can create are worthless, compared to the stuff i collecring in the game, do why even have that option available?. In the middle of the game i have the option to pay for extra items which seems greedy, since i already payed for the game in the first place. 2 stars
replyContent: Items that you can buy are deliberately not at the beginning, so as not to provoke a purchase. You can find armor similar up to this point. And the weapons you can buy can be obtained for free in the game. Completing tasks. The purchase function is needed for people who support the project.

content: Great offline game. Great action platformer with rpg elements. Simple controls with Souls-like elements. Challenging bosses and plenty to explore. Finished the game three times with only one achievement to unlock (Shortway). Defeated the holiday themed boss. Looking forward to next DLC expansion/update. I recommend adding or expanding more on the skill tree. Thank you!
I liked the game very much. It's fun to kill zombies and bosses in different locations. I think the application will appeal to all fans of the RPG genre. Five stars!
I recommend the application to all fans of RPG platformers. The game is lightweight, but very addicting. Everything works fine, without crashes and bugs. Developers are highly rated!
An excellent RPG game. The application works stably, without lags. It's a pleasure to play. Interesting plot, high-quality graphics. Developers five stars and more game updates.
The platformer was incredibly hooked with its high-quality gameplay, beautiful graphics and many locations. Developers five stars, more updates and respect!

Kudos to the developers for this awesome RPG platformer. Exciting battles with monsters and bosses, caches with rewards. The application is lightweight and works flawlessly. Five stars and further updates !!!
replyContent: thanks for the review

content: A great RPG game. Great graphics, nice music. It is interesting to go through various levels, defeating monsters and bosses. I give five stars for a well-done work!
replyContent: Thanks for the review, Good game!

content: Its cool. But there aren't any guides for the game. I want to give this game 5 stars its worth it. I think the map could use a tune up and maybe some way of knowing what items still need to be obtained. Bur without taking away from the challenge of searching.
replyContent: Write me an email, I will answer. I don't quite understand what you are asking.

content: The application is very pleased with its gameplay, well-thought-out plot, the music is perfectly matched. I play with pleasure from the day of installation. The developers are constantly releasing updates, so the game does not get boring at all. Thanks for the interesting RPG platformer.
replyContent: Thanks for the detailed review :/

content: A very awesome game indeed. I like the animation and the controls are great, the combat isn't awkward unlike the other souls like game. I am only at the first boss yet and I already love this game, I just hope there is more content to come because this is really a great game. Edit: Just finished the game and it only takes few hours, I'm glad that this will be longer in the future and there's more content to come, I'm also exited for the sequel. This is truly a hidden gem.
replyContent: Thanks for this detailed review. I'm glad the game is fun. Now I am developing a sequel, where there will be a lot of new things. But I keep coming back to add something to the game. For example, now I have added a small New Year event. It is available after completing the main part of the game.

content: Excellent RPG platformer. Made in a little retro style, but very high quality. The game is incredibly addictive with an interesting plot. With pleasure I roam the dungeons with the knight. Thanks to the developers for the work done and five stars.
replyContent: Thanks for the detailed feedback. I wish you a good game.

content: Immediately after installation, the game is incredibly addictive. Excellent RPG platformer. Nice music, high quality graphics. Killing bosses takes the knight to new, more interesting levels. Well done developers, deserved five stars!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Trying to make the game even better. Write if you have any questions.

content: Great game played it through a bunch of times but up to play through 3 and then finding new things dropped off a bit and the difficulty was fairly easy I'm sure there are a few more things to find though...wouldn't mind an expansion to keep going

thanks for the review, yes, I think I will make another addition for this game.
Now I am thinking over a new game that I have already started.

content: It's a pretty great game, just finished it. The only 'negative' part that I found was that it is too easy. It's the same idea on on, hit 1-2 times and roll. Also I noticed that frame cancelling is possible, which makes the game even easier. Nonetheless a great game !

content: Really nice piece of mobile rpg. There's only one thing I hate... that I already finish everything :D enjoyed small differences on newgame+, for example few different secrets. I Just don't like Demon world, not so much content in there :/ can't wait to try something new from you guys!

content: Nice adventure, challengeable, cool pixel graphics & atmosphere, expect dying a lot ^^

content: Really great game but the catacombs maybe has a bug? I get to the lowering floor where I have to hit three switches to make the floor drop and avoid being crushed by the closing walls and I hit the 3 switches and...nothing. the floor doesn't lower and I die every time. Kind of sucks because I feel I've invested a lot of time to stop at this point.
replyContent: Thank you for this appreciation of my game. No, this is not a mistake, this is a special trap. The right wall doesn't move and you just need to hit it and run to the right. Please correct the review, because there is no error.

content: Nice game.Response:Probably the bossfights and how large maps are which is great for exploring and finding loot.
replyContent: Thanks for the answer. I'm glad that I like the game. I try to make it even better.

content: Seems a solid game, though with very incomplete controller support. It's impossible to map the second quick slot, as it defaults to the first when you press an input. The biggest problem though, is the controller only works for the gamelplay. Being an rpg, much time is spent in menus, and with on-screen interactions. Touch screen is the only way to accomplish these. Edit: appreciate dev response, I'll email about the quick slot mapping.
replyContent: thanks, I'll wait.

content: Nice game, reasonable graphics. I played and finished it. Few notes: there should be a quest log. Fight system is not good enough, it's just roll and hit. Story is there but the dialogues are boring. Expected a bit more, I guess it's ok. Combat system can be enhanced by adding damage on roll in some cases when enemies send hits via the floor, like Cabal from MK, also the shield - never used it because rolling is better so there is that issue. Also Rage - don't know what that is for. Also Rage
replyContent: rage increases the chance to crit passively, + activates abilities that can be learned in the citadel. some enemies can deal damage while rolling. But I will think about how I can improve it.

content: Great game. Only thing I‚Äôd like to have is a map. Game is hard enough without having to try to figure out where you‚Äôve been and where you‚Äôre headed. Playing on a tablet but please port this to iOS! I think it would be a huge success there!!
replyContent: hello there is a map in the game. in the citadel you can buy it for 1000 gold from the alchemist.

content: I love absolutely love this game, and can tell alot of love went into making it. The control's were a bit of a learning curve for me and I took a beating for the first hour, dying constantly. But after I got the rythm of dodging down things got alot smoother, so that was more of a mistake on my part and not the game itself. I do hope that this game will have more updates adding content because I would love to keep coming back to this. My favorite platforming RPG on mobile easily.
replyContent: Hey, thanks for your feedback. I'm glad you like the game.

content: I enjoyed it, but felt it was a bit short. Also too long due to the lack of a map/instruction. By the end there were several things I was unsure what to do with, but whats the point in finding out when I'll be running around the few explorable places for a couple more hours to fight the same enemies again? If I could add another comment/more words my review wouldn't have sounded so absolute and negative, but I appreciate you guys are adding more, and I'll check it out again shortly!
replyContent: did you like the game, but you put 3 stars? I am updating the gameplay to increase the gameplay. Have you played in the small dlc forgotten kingdom? Also in the new update I will add a map. As I understand from your feedback, you were in a hurry to pass the game without exploring the levels. In any case, I will keep this in mind in the future.

content: NG +2 and so far, so so. Gameplay is decent enough, the story line is a bit shallow but still enjoyable. I believe the forgotten kingdom DLC is bugged. I've been through it a few times and have beaten the nameless King but nothing comes of it, no reward for being one of the more difficult level and boss with minions to get through.
replyContent: Thank you for writing. I wanted to reward a new sword, but decided to hide it. it can be found in the catacombs. it's powerful enough. I'll figure out how to improve it

content: The controls were what put me off. The story is average in my opinion at least. But this game is not bad. Give it a go. It's just not my taste.

content: It's fun

Great game, classic feel and decent controllers, though I wish it were a virtual joystick instead of the arrows. "You died" pops up a few hundred times reminding me of Dark Souls times. The longs halls takes me back to Link 2, which I loved as a kid. Always makes me happy buying a game that has some texture. Edit: I really enjoyed demons, just because the difficulty jump made it hard. Cool mechanics in the game! :-) I suddenly got the Godslayer artifact, which I'm not sure was intended.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback. I love Souls games. Their complexity and style. I would like to know what moment in the game you liked the most. The sword hit by mistake. It will disappear over time.

content: Its really fun. Update is much more forgiving than dark rage but it feels like a much more fleshed out adventure. Honestly i would like to see puzzles integrated into the world on the next crusades branching paths etc. Love that no stamina is consumed. Big fan of your work right here

content: Honestly, it's fun! However, there are some things that make it confusing. 1. It never tells me what being enraged does. I max out the meter, but it doesn't change anything. 2. I can't sell ANY of my old equipment (or it doesn't tell me how, if I can). It's not hard to get gold, but it does clutter inventory. 3. Any of the things sold by the Wishmaster can only be bought with money. I have no problem supporting the developer. But I already paid for the game, so it feels like a waste of space.
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback, the dlc will soon be released in the game with new levels and a boss,
which is available after the main story, it's free.

content: A few stages into this game, and really enjoying it so far. Monsters have unique behaviors, and are challenging. The stage artwork is also good though simple, and music very good. content: Great game, frustrating at first but youl get over it. It isnt catchy at first but as you go on, it is really good. content: Great game souls-like platformer

content: This is a fantastic game thus far. I love anything metroidvania & when the genre was blended with souls-like gameplay it was a match made in heaven. After 20 years of waiting (ugh, so old) for games like SOTN to make a comeback its finally happening. I'm more then happy to add this little gem to my collection. One gripe though: When the player attacks in mid jump he loses all momentum & just drops like a stone. If that & the controls in general could be tightened up that would be perfect.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, I will be happy to improve this if you email me more about the controls.

content: Great. Just came back from iPhone to Android. This plays great on my Pixel 4 XL. I love dark souls and this is like it, but with pixel art style which to me is so cool. It has its own story so I'm not say a bad thing it being like dark souls. I hope it is took as a compliment. It is worth the money. Glad to find this game and developer. I would like to thank all the people that made this little gem of a game. I plan on buying more from this developer. Awesome work every one should give it a go.
replyContent: thanks for the review, yes souls like game because i love it. I'm working on add content in mortal crusade and over the sequel.

content: As a big fan of the developer's previous game, Dark Rage, I was very happy to see a new title in the same style; and it doesn't disappoint. It's basically Dark Souls meets Metroidvania, with gorgeous pixel graphics and another memorable soundtrack. This time round the world seems more open, and there are more ways to customize your knight. More secrets to find too. Finished the game twice, nearly all achievements completed, and enjoyed every minute spent. Another excellent game.
replyContent: thanks for this nice review. I'm glad that I like the game. I will improve it in every possible way, if you have any questions or suggestions, write to me. good game!

content: Awesome game with lots of potential. Some suggestions would be giving hints like with the shovel for destroyable walls and maybe use a "?" when near a secret as it can be really hard to find such as a ledge you can drop down to but unable to see or a wall on an elevator.
replyContent:
thanks for the detailed review and suggestion. I will consider how I can implement this.
have a nice day

content: good game keep up the good work

content: Honestly, i must say this is the best action rpg i have ever played. The controls are so responsive and very well places. The graphic and backgrounds are really good for a pixle phone game. I can really tell a lot of love and time went into this game and i must say i am extremely impressed. Very much worth the price. I also wanted to add that the music is also pretty dope which i didnt notice at first. im just so impressed with how much work went into this app. 5 stars!!

content: Mortal Crusade: Sword of Knight is a beautiful 2D action platformer with a deep inventory system, a fun roster of enemies who vary in style and a charm that comes from its setting and aesthetic. It is definitely easy to recommend, even though (and I'm nitpicking) the gamepad experience can be further improved.
replyContent: Thank you for such a detailed review. I'm glad you are getting a good experience from the game. Email me and we will discuss improving the gamepad.

content: Love the game, a solid platformer RPG! The sword combat is really fun and the RPG elements are really involved - you can tell a lot of thought has gone into its design and how the player's knight can be levelled and geared up. The boss fights are especially enjoyable, and there's plenty of them! Would recommend to anyone.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! It is very nice.
